item.title: Kendriya Vidyalaya for Jogulamba Gadwal gets green signal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: BJP National Vice-President and Mahbubnagar MP D.K. Aruna welcomed the development, calling it significant that the long-pending demand for a Kendriya Vidyalaya (KV) in Jogulamba Gadwal district has finally materialised, following her persistent efforts.
On March 12 this year, during a Parliament session, Aruna strongly urged the establishment of Kendriya Vidyalayas in Makthal, Kodangal constituencies and Jogulamba Gadwal town, highlighting the need for quality education facilities i...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Big Story, Andhra Pradesh
